articles.content: Gronkowski, a long-time New England Patriots teammate and close friend of Buccaneers quarterback Tom Brady, will receive $10 million for the 2021 campaign with bonuses worth an additional $3 million,… [+2829 chars]

articles.title: 'A disaster': Alexander Zverev filthy over Roger Federer ranking - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: Despite missing over a year due to injury, Roger Federer remained ranked higher than the German star.
articles.content:
Alexander Zverev says the ATP rankings are 'a mess' after he was ranked below Roger Federer in the latest ranking update. Pictures: Getty Images
